address.desc_x_1: This is your X-Chain address to send and receive funds.
address.desc_x_2: Your address will change after every deposit. You can keep using previous addresses.
address.desc_p: This is your P-Chain address to send and receive funds, receive rewards and govern the network.

address.desc_c: This is your C-Chain address. Use it to interact with the ethereum virtual machine.

typeDesc.generic: Generic collectibles consist of an image, title and a description. The wallet can display them nicely.

typeDesc.json: JSON payloads are ideal for custom data structures and can be used to develop decentralized applications.
typeDesc.utf8: UTF8 payloads are simply text encoded into a collectible.

descriptions.title: The title of the deposit offer shown in the Wallet earn section.
descriptions.offer_start: Start-time at which this offer becomes available to be used to deposit funds.
descriptions.offer_end: End-time at which this offer becomes unavailable.
descriptions.min_amount: Minimum amount that can be deposited in one deposit.
descriptions.max_amount: Maximum amount that can be deposited with this offer in total (across all deposits).
descriptions.interest_rate: Annual reward of the deposited funds in percent.
descriptions.total_max_reward_amount: Maximum amount that can be rewarded for all deposits created with this offer in total
descriptions.minimum_duration: The minimum duration which can be picked when creating a deposit based on this offer. In most cases this is identical to 'Maximum Duration' - especially in combination with 'Vesting period' and/or 'Period without rewards' this field should not be different to 'Maximum Duration'.
descriptions.maximum_duration: The maximum duration which can be picked when creating a deposit based on this offer.
descriptions.vesting_period: The period of time in which a gradual undeposit of the tokens is happening. This duration is inside the duration of the deposit at the end. For instance, a deposit of 100 days and 10 days in this field will apply starting at day 90 of the deposit.
descriptions.period_without_rewards: The period of time in which no rewards are being accumulated. This duration is inside the duration of the deposit at the end. For instance, a deposit of 100 days and 10 days in this field will apply starting at day 90 of the deposit.
descriptions.restricted: If selected, only allowed addresses can see this deposit offer in the Wallet and use it to deposit funds. Caution: If the deposit offer is not restricted, everyone on the network can use it to deposit funds!

create.owner_address: Owner Address (If filled, only allowed addresses can see and deposit funds.)

errors.title: Offer title should not exceed 256 characters.
errors.min_amount: Minimum amount must be at least {minAmount} {symbol}.
errors.has_exclusive_total_max_amount_or_reward: can only use either TotalMaxAmount or TotalMaxRewardAmount
errors.is_max_reward_amount_and_interest_rate_i: Interest rate must be 0 if total max reward amount is 0, and vice versa
errors.is_min_duration_less_than_no_rewards_per: deposit offer minimum duration ({minDuration}) is less than no-rewards period duration ({noRewardsPeriodDuration})
errors.is_min_duration_less_than_unlock_period: deposit offer minimum duration ({minDuration}) is less than vesting period duration ({unlockPeriodDuration})
errors.is_max_diration_less_than_min_duration: deposit offer max duration ({maxDuration}) is less than minimum duration ({minDuration})
errors.is_min_duration_equal_to_zero: deposit offer has zero minimum duration
errors.is_start_date_greater_than_end_date: deposit offer start date is greater than end date
